Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's batting has been largely consistent, but the bowling has been a bit of a letdown.
South Africa's batters have been in belligerent form, scoring 300+ in every one of their full innings so far.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan scored 282/7 against Afghanistan, courtesy of captain Babar Azam's half-century, and a late flourish from Iftikhar Ahmad and Shadab Khan.
South Africa have won three of their four matches so far, by margins of 102 runs, 134 runs and 229 runs against Sri Lanka, Australia and England respectively.
Others: The match will begin at 2:00pm IST on 27 October, 2023.
The two nations have faced each other 82 times in ODIs, with South Africa coming out on top 51 times and Pakistan having won 30 occasions.
